Articles.Content:
hi, I'd like to land on minmus and hop on some biomes, and as I did for the mun and kerbin I used the alt+f12 cheat menu.
the probem with minmus is that on the sunny side, the surface is too bright to clearly see the biomes.
I want to land under the sun but I cannot distiguish the biomes borders at all.
any workarounds?

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/bmmzp4dcrevyo3o/AADuogvZMI2CSKVsefz6D210a?dl=0

32 minutes ago, antipro said:

hi, I'd like to land on minmus and hop on some biomes, and as I did for the mun and kerbin I used the alt+f12 cheat menu.
the probem with minmus is that on the sunny side, the surface is too bright to clearly see the biomes.
I want to land under the sun but I cannot distiguish the biomes borders at all.
any workarounds?

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/bmmzp4dcrevyo3o/AADuogvZMI2CSKVsefz6D210a?dl=0

I use waypoint manager to mark biomes from map view.

You could use the ambient light boost setting in the "regular" flight setting menu.

If you set the ambient light boost: map to a lower setting, it will reduce the brightness of the map view without changing the brightness of the flight view.
